tool_description: Email Snitch is the fast and easy way to validate email addresses.
name: Email Snitch
title: Email Snitch

api_list.name: Check
api_list.description: Validate and lookup information for a given email address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-snitch.p.rapidapi.com/v1/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-snitch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-snitch.p.rapidapi.com/v1/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-snitch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
